main event: A circular object with a tail was observed for one hour at Stewart AFB, New York on July 23, 1955.
interesting points: The object was oblong in shape and varied in size.
The object moved erratically, stayed stationary at times, and described a circular path.
The high and erratic winds at the time were likely the cause of the object's movements, suggesting it was a balloon.
The object was visible for the entire one-hour duration due to the erratic winds.
sighted object: a circular object with a tail
